    • Method Detail

      • numToMonth

        public java.lang.String numToMonth(int m)
        Converts an integer to a month, where 0 is January and 11 is December.
        Parameters:
        m - month in number form.
        Returns:
        month from monthsArray corresponding to correct int

      • EasterMath

        public void EasterMath(int year)
        Recalculates the date for Easter based on the year. Useful for calculating the number of days in an Easter cycle.
        Parameters:
        year - The year from which to calculate Easter

      • findEasterDay

        public void findEasterDay()
        Finds the number of times a date has Easter in an Easter cycle. Increments a 2D array corresponding to the date on the calendar.

      • daysInCycle

        public void daysInCycle()
        Prints out the dates in order in which a date has at least one Easter.
